'''Genshin Impact × famima PRINT''' is a collaborative effort between ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' creators [[HoYoverse]] and the Japan convenience store Family Mart. The service is provided by a paid network printer installed in a convenience store.

==Collaborations==

===Continuously from January 2025===
In this collaboration, you can purchase birthday illustration (Chibi) bromide, Paimon's Paintings stickers, and calendars. They are updated every birthday. The code required for printing is available on the [[https://fp.famima.com/|famima PRINT website]].

Available characters:
*Wanderer (Jan 3)
*Thoma (Jan 9)
*Chevreuse (Jan 10)
*Diona (Jan 18)
*Citlali (Jan 20)
*Kirara (Jan 22)
*Rosaria (Jan 24)
The sticker comes with a code that allows you to earn all characters and in-game items every month.
*{{Item|Primogem|x=40}}
*{{Item|Mora|x=30000}}
*{{Item|Mystic Enhancement Ore|x=5}}
*{{Item|Saurian Claw Succulent|x=1}}
One account can be used up to 3 times, and January and February are counted together. Currently, it is unknown to be issued after March.
